steps.details: Push cloudburst advisory to residents and commuters in Bellandur–Ecospace corridor.
BBMP to stage pumps and clearing teams at known choke points before peak rainfall.
Advise closure of low-lying markets and outdoor works until risk subsides.
BMTC and BMRCL to prepare contingency shuttles and reroutes for stranded commuters.
IMD and TMC to monitor radar and update alerts as the storm evolves.

plan.plan_title: Severe Waterlogging on Outer Ring Road (Ecospace)

steps.details: Block access to submerged service roads and reroute traffic to higher-capacity links.
Activate BBMP pump teams and clear storm drains to reduce standing water.
Dispatch tow teams and ambulances for vulnerable people and disabled vehicles.
BWSSB to address sewage mixing and issue public health guidance on contamination.
Use traffic feeds and social channels to warn against travel and provide safe detour routes.
Enforce dedicated lanes for ambulances and fire services; temporarily suspend on-street parking.
Deploy tow and recovery units in coordinated strikes to remove stalled vehicles quickly.
TMC to reconfigure signal timings and push reroutes to navigation providers.
Warn residents not to attempt crossings; advise on nearest open shelters and assistance points.
City Ops to coordinate BESCOM, BBMP, BWSSB and BTP for combined response and resource allocation.
